entry.title: klashcard Privacy Policy
entry.summary: Privacy Policy kvpratama built the klashcard app as an Open Source app. This SERVICE is provided by kvpratama at no cost and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service. If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of info...

entry.title: Into The Wild (Jon Krakauer)

entry.title: Life Is What You Make It (Peter Buffett)

link.title: Life Is What You Make It (Peter Buffett)

entry.summary: Location 194-197 Added on Wednesday, September 22, 2021 5:40:42 PM Life is what we make it, and if we want our lives to be as rich and round and gratifying as possible, we should try to learn about everything-not just what we need to know to make our livings, but all the innumerable subjects at the periphery of our specialties.
